Book a Table

Upcoming Events

Join us for great food, drinks, and entertainment at The Menagerie!

Live Music Fridays

Every Friday evening, enjoy live performances from local artists while savoring our chef’s specials. Starts at 8 PM.

Quiz Night Thursdays

Test your knowledge and win prizes! Gather your team of up to 6 and compete in our weekly general knowledge quiz. Starts at 7 PM.

Themed Dinner Nights

Once a month, experience a unique dining event featuring themed cuisine and decor. Check our social media for the next theme!
